conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: Hello, I'm glad you could make it today.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: Before we start, is there anything specific you'd like to focus on?

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: I've been feeling a bit overwhelmed at work lately.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: My manager keeps adding new projects and I can't keep up.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: It's starting to affect my sleep too.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: It sounds like the workload is becoming unmanageable for you.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: And it's clearly having a physical impact if you're losing sleep.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: Yeah, I just don't know how to say no.
